content.data: When talking about yourself, you can mention your name, age, job, hobbies, and other personal details.
Example: I am Raj. I am 25 years old, and I am a software developer.

Useful phrases include:
- My name is [your name].
- I am [age] years old.
- I work as [your job].

content.question: What can you mention when talking about yourself?
